alert.note: Alert for Southern Worcester (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 12:42PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Windham, southeastern Worcester, western Kent and Providence Counties through 130 PM EDT... At 1242 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Plainfield, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Heavy rain could cause minor flooding Locations impacted include... Providence, Cranston, Pawtucket, Coventry, Cumberland, North Providence, Johnston, Plainfield, Smithfield, Lincoln, Central Falls, Killingly, Burrillville, Uxbridge, North Smithfield, Scituate, Glocester, Putnam, Douglas and Brooklyn. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 PM EDT for northern Connecticut...central Massachusetts...and Rhode Island.
